AD_ABlackAbyss.synopsis: At the edge of the southern abyss at approximately CTY_Main_A, Position: -447.81, 19.69, -1680.86, place a trigger that generates a Narrator AD

AD_MotherSuperior.synopsis: In the House of Grief, Unburdening Chamber, AD from clicking on a bust

AD_SharranObelisk.synopsis: AD from clicking on the Obelisk in the Obelisk Room

AD_MapOfFaerun.synopsis: A map that generates an AD when clicked on, in the Armoury on the big table.

AD_ABlackAbyss_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ABlackAbyss_0.text: *A black abyss so deep no light can reach its bottom. To what dire purposes have the Sharrans put this very convenient pit?*

AD_MotherSuperior_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MotherSuperior_0.text: *The inscription on this bust reads 'Mother Superior V' - a curious object to find in a secular therapy centre.* [NOTE - V is to be pronounced Vee]

AD_SharranObelisk_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SharranObelisk_0.text: *A Sharran Obelisk - you are entering a place consecrated to the Dark Lady.*

AD_MapOfFaerun_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MapOfFaerun_0.text: *A map of Faerûn with indigo circles inked in next to Neverwinter, Waterdeep, Thornhold, and Baldur's Gate. It looks like the Mother Superior has plans for the Sword Coast.*
